definition: (of time) to elapse or pass/(of a situation) to develop or evolve
to push/to cut/to refuse/to reject/to decline/to shirk (responsibility)/to put off/to delay/to push forward/to nominate/to elect/massage
to move/to shift/to change/to alter/to remove

sentences.english: As time gose by, man is making the earth sike .
sentences.chinese: 隨着時間的推移，人類正在令地球受到破壞。

sentences.english: Over time, the more aggressive neocomms may come to dominate.
sentences.chinese: 隨着時間的推移，更有闖勁的新保守派可能成爲主導。

sentences.english: The moving velocity of solid-liquid interface decreases with time in constant temperature boundary and increases with time in constant heat flux boundary.
sentences.chinese: 在等熱流邊界條件下，相變速率隨時間的推移而增大。

sentences.english: But as time passed, resistance forces grew stronger.
sentences.chinese: 但隨着時間的推移，抵抗力量逐漸壯大。

sentences.english: As time went on,his intelligence rayed out more brightly.
sentences.chinese: 隨着時間的推移，他的智慧之光愈加燦爛奪目。

sentences.english: Rule of bed load transport in tidal reach of the Yangtze River and distributing rule along the river are studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究長江感潮河段推移質輸移規律和沿程分佈規律。

sentences.english: The bad image that love hotels had has faded over time.
sentences.chinese: 隨着時間的推移，情人旅館的壞名聲消退了。

sentences.english: At the start stage, with larger spin ratios, there is faster discharge of the entrapped lubricants.
sentences.chinese: 隨時間推移，自旋因數越小，封閉潤滑油排出越快。

sentences.english: Perhaps along with makes the time the passage, the story-telling session continues, to believe that we meet.
sentences.chinese: 也許隨做時間的推移，故事會繼續，相信我們會再見。

sentences.english: The economic crisis grows worse, and harder to resolve, with each passing week.
sentences.chinese: 隨着時間的推移，經濟危機日益惡化，難以解決。

sentences.english: Something will dawn on you as time goes on.
sentences.chinese: 隨着時間的推移，有些事理你會慢慢漸悟的。

sentences.english: The surface of plastic objects breaks over time.
sentences.chinese: 隨着時間的推移，塑膠製品的表面會磨損。

sentences.english: Over time, more devices have been integrated into the motherboard.
sentences.chinese: 隨着時間的推移，更多的設備被集成到主板上。

sentences.english: However over time, we realized that we were naive.
sentences.chinese: 但是隨着時間的推移，我們發現自己太天真了。

sentences.english: With time, a pro-Iranian government in Baghdad might join in.
sentences.chinese: 隨着時間推移，一個親伊朗的伊拉克也許也會加入。

sentences.english: But that's going to change over time.
sentences.chinese: 但是，隨着時間的推移，這一點將會改變。

definition: to progress (or increase, change etc) day by day/more (or better etc) with each passing day
to take over (from one another)/to alternate/to replace/to relay
